name: Turing Arena A.I. Prototype
description:
Movement: Arrow Keys

Aim/shoot: Z

A demo of human-like A.I. movement. You control the red circle that starts in the bottom-center square. Try to blend in with the AI! Normally, two A.I. circles of the same color will never enter the same room together, but occasionally all circles of the same color will simultaneously move to a single spot. 

The full game would be an arcade deathmatch where players attempt to blend in while figuring out which "actors" are actually enemy players.
